John McCain says to keep Ahmadinejad off sacred ground.

It isn't sacred ground, it's a place where a lot of people died because of the US foreign policy of policing the world, and having troops stationed in nations of people who do not want them there.  If you have access to the internet, you can get your news from somewhere other than the government and its television mouthpieces. So you have no excuse to

They are, at this time, intent on propagandising against Iran until they can attain 30 or 40% public support for aggression against it. This visit is opposed entirely because it would undermine administration propaganda efforts.
 
 
Obviously, it is a propaganda ploy on his part, and if we allowed him to do it it would just embolden his followers and give him the publicity he seeks."
